title: Weapons & Items
description: How well do you know Fortnite's arsenal of weapons and items?

questions.question: What color represents Legendary rarity in Fortnite?
questions.explanation: Legendary items are gold/orange colored and are the second-rarest items in the game after Mythic!

questions.question: What is the correct order of weapon rarity from lowest to highest?
questions.explanation: The rarity order is Common (Gray), Uncommon (Green), Rare (Blue), Epic (Purple), and Legendary (Gold)!

questions.question: The SCAR is an assault rifle in Fortnite.
questions.explanation: The SCAR (Special Combat Assault Rifle) is one of the most iconic and beloved weapons in Fortnite!

questions.question: What item instantly gives you full shield?
questions.explanation: The Chug Jug gives you full health AND full shield, but takes 15 seconds to consume!

questions.question: How much shield does a Mini Shield give you?
questions.explanation: Mini Shields give 25 shield each but can only bring you up to 50 shield maximum!

questions.question: The Pump Shotgun can one-shot eliminate a player with a headshot.
questions.explanation: A well-placed Pump Shotgun headshot can deal over 200 damage, instantly eliminating a player at full health and shield!

questions.question: What explosive weapon travels in an arc and bounces before exploding?
questions.explanation: Grenades are thrown in an arc and bounce off surfaces before exploding after a short fuse!

questions.question: What does a Medkit restore?
questions.explanation: A Medkit restores your health to full (100 HP) but takes 10 seconds to use!
